title: Drawing, Design for Mahogany and Inlay Sideboard, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Mahogany and Inlay Sideboard
medium: Pen and black ink and graphite on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed lower right of design: Mahogany & Inlay Sideboard / $55.00; upper center: [illeg.]; on drawer: [numerical notations indicating dimensions]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Narrow rectangular sideboard with slightly convex front on narrow straight tapering legs; two drawers in central section, each with single round pull; backsplash; rectangular shelf below cabinetry midway down legs.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Mahogany and Inlay Sideboard, 1900–05. Pen and black ink and graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-13.
